title: uMSC-Exo [miRNA-seq]
characteristics_ch1.1: cell type: umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cells
treatment_protocol_ch1: Culture medium collection started when cells reach 90% confluence. The medium were collected every other day.
growth_protocol_ch1: HEK293T and uMSCs are cultured in T75 flasks for exosome preparation. The medium used for exosome collection were modified by using an exosome-free culture medium. In brief, we first centrifuged fetal bovine serum at 120,000g 4C overnight to exclude any serum exosomes from the product. The supernatant were syringed through a 0.22μm filter before use. DMEM with 10% exosome-free FBS were used for both uMSC and HEK293T culture.
extract_protocol_ch1: Total RNA was extracted from exosomes. The RNA quality was checked by Bioanalyzer 2200 (Aligent) and kept at -80℃.The RNA with RIN >8.0 is right for miRNA purification. miRNA was purified by miRNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen) and the purification result was validated by Gel electrophoresis.
extract_protocol_ch1.1: The complementary DNA (cDNA) libraries for single-end sequencing were prepared using Ion Total RNA-Seq Kit v2.0 (Life Technologies) according to the manufacturer’s instructions. The cDNA libraries were then processed for the Proton Sequencing process according to the commercially available protocols. Samples were diluted and mixed, the mixture was processed on a OneTouch 2 instrument (Life Technologies) and enriched on a OneTouch 2 ES station (Life Technologies) for preparing the template-positive Ion PI™ Ion Sphere™ Particles (Life Technologies) according to Ion PI™ Template OT2 200 Kit v2.0 (Life Technologies). After enrichment, the mixed template-positive Ion PI™ Ion Sphere™ Particles of samples was loaded on to 1 P1v2 Proton Chip (Life Technologies) and sequenced on Proton Sequencers according to Ion PI Sequencing 200 Kit v2.0 (Life Technologies) by NovelBio Corp. Laboratory, Shanghai.
data_processing: Reads filtering under criteria removing reads with 20% of the base quality lower than 13
data_processing.1: We applied the reads filtering towards the raw reads after sequencing to achieve the clean data following the criteria: a) 30% base quality <13 b) read length < 17bp c) adaptor sequence.
data_processing.2: Utilizing the BWA software, we mapped the clean data to miRBase 21.0 Homo Sapiens miRNA database and GRCH37.p13 genome.
data_processing.5: Supplementary_files_format_and_content: txt file contain counts for each sample
